name: Random Robot
description:
The theme was: Uncontrollable Fate

We think the theme was very fun and not restrictive! We liked the theme and started to work immediately after the theme was announced. We look forward to the next Jam! And we hope you like our Game

Graphics by: LeaveLess

Sound by: LeaveLess

Programmed by: Fishbigger Studios

Music by: Fishbigger Studios

Game Design by: LeaveLess and Fishbigger Studios
